tasks.label: Maven Clean Install
tasks.command: VERSION=1.1.1 && SERVER_DIR="/home/egehan/Test Server" && mvn clean install && for MODULE in bukkit bungeecord velocity; do if [ "$MODULE" = "bungeecord" ]; then MODULE_PROPER="BungeeCord"; else MODULE_PROPER="$(echo ${MODULE} | sed 's/^\(.*\)$/\u\1/')"; fi; JAR_PATH="minebridge-${MODULE}/target/MineBridge-${MODULE_PROPER}-${VERSION}.jar"; if [ -f "$JAR_PATH" ]; then case "$MODULE" in bukkit) TARGET="${SERVER_DIR}/1.8/plugins/";; bungeecord) TARGET="${SERVER_DIR}/BungeeCord/plugins/";; velocity) TARGET="${SERVER_DIR}/Velocity/plugins/";; esac; cp -f "$JAR_PATH" "$TARGET" && echo "âœ“ ${MODULE_PROPER} plugin copied successfully"; fi; done
